text: nannal kristyanikalan enn parannavaril ninnum nam karar vannukayuntayi. ennitt avarkk ulbeadhanam nalkappettatil ninn oru bhagam avar marannukalannu. atinal avarkkitayil uyirttelunnelpinre naluvarekkum satrutayum vidvesavum nam ilakkivittu. avar ceytkeantirunnatinepparriyellam allahu pinnitavare parannariyikkunnatanâ€Œ
